title: MemoFormer
description: Memory-augmented transformer for forecasting structured sequences. Applied to groundwater prediction and tumor microenvironment modeling. Combines memory tokens, autoregressive decoding, and scheduled sampling.

title: RNA BPTT Reinforcement Learning Simulator
description: Differentiable RL framework for RNA sequence generation with motif placement, GC balance, and structure fidelity. Uses ViennaRNA folding oracle and backpropagation through time.

title: Neurofolding: RNA Design via Transformer + RL
description: Transformer + GRU/LSTM agent for de novo RNA sequence generation with structure-aware rewards. Introduced 'Neurofolding' to describe the gradient-informed folding-aware synthesis process.

title: Clinical-Query-Assistant
description: Fine-tuned FLAN-T5 with LoRA on NHS A–Z medical data. Deployed as a lightweight chatbot via Gradio. Used PEFT for efficient tuning.

title: Autonomous Drone RL
description: 3D drone environment in PyBullet with Lidar. Trained with PPO, DDPG, and DQN. Employed reward shaping and Prioritized Experience Replay. Achieved >85% success in randomized setups.

title: Pokémon Card Classifier
description: EfficientNetB0 + BiLSTM classifier trained on 430k+ Pokémon TCG card images. Achieved ~99% accuracy. Image augmentations and GPU-accelerated TensorFlow pipeline.

title: Energy Load Predictor
description: Energy usage forecasting using XGBoost on smart building sensor data. Integrated W&B for feature tuning and visual analytics.

title: ECG Classifier with BPTT-LSTMs
description: LSTM-based model trained using BPTT for classifying ECG rhythms (Normal, AF, Other). Achieved ~90% accuracy. Used sequence segment augmentation.

title: Maze RL Agent with Memory
description: Tabular Q-learning with explicit memory vectors for navigating mazes with random exits. No RNNs needed. Published at the Computing Conference 2023.

title: Sentient Agent with BPTT
description: Simulated RNN-based organism trained with BPTT to exhibit memory-based adaptive behavior in partially observable environments. Published in Adaptive Behavior 2023.

title: BCI for VR (Unity + EEG)
description: Brain-computer interface for Unity3D using EEG signals. Enabled interactive VR object manipulation through mental commands from consumer headsets.
